# vk-sound-player

> 一款h5 audio音频的简单封装

## Build Setup

``` bash
# install dependencies
npm install

# run doc-server at localhost:9527
npm run doc

# run demo at localhost:8080
npm run start

# build all components
npm run build:start 

# build demo-src 
npm run build

# run all tests
npm test
```
